text: @TeamTrump @realDonaldTrump Why ya´ll STILL doing in-person meetings!? @realDonaldTrump no shaking hands. no stupid elbow/feet bumps. And get some social media options for DIGITAL meetings! You are the president, & your protection right now includes from covid19. Same w VP 6 ya´lls families :)
